Address.label: Address
Address.value: AVENIDA DRA. RUTH CARDOSO,8501, 30TH FLOOR, PINHEIROS, 05425-070, Brazil

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Embraer SA based in Sao Paulo, Brazil, Embraer manufactures regional aircraft, business jets, and defense and security products. The company also offers a range of services to support its installed base of hardware. Its defense and security business is currently focused on developing the KC-390 military transport aircraft. The company also produces aircraft systems and structural components. It operates through the following segments; Commercial Aviation; Defense and Security; Executive Jets and Service and Support. The company generates maximum revenue from Commercial Aviation segment.
